hero.title: Walk with us in this mission
hero.subtitle: The Gospel advances when the body of Christ moves together. There are real ways to walk alongside us.

caminhos.title: Three ways to walk with us

orar.descricao: Your intercession is essential to strengthen us and open pathways for the Gospel to advance. Sign up to receive our prayer requests and walk with us in spirit.
orar.acao: I want to pray for you

contribuir.descricao: Your financial partnership allows us to devote time and resources to reach lives and disciple believers. Every offering sustains our family in the field and enables ministry actions in churches.

cooperar.descricao: Take part actively by cooperating with your gifts and talents. Join as a volunteer in outreach actions, as a partner church that sends us, or as a multiplier who shares our resources with other leaders.

familia.title: A family in the field
familia.text_1: We are Navarro Lamounier, Tereza Gontijo, Lavínia, and Ravnos. A missionary family fully dedicated to serving as a bridge between the Gospel and the digital and gaming universe.
familia.text_2: Our daily life is training churches, producing evangelistic content, and advancing in the digital field where millions of young people seek meaning.
familia.text_3: As a missionary family, we depend on God's provision, which comes through partners committed to the Kingdom. Every prayer, every contribution, and every cooperation makes a real difference.

transparencia.title: Where your offering goes
transparencia.text: Your contribution supports our family in the mission field and directly invests in the mission: travel to churches, training materials, equipment for evangelistic actions, and content production. We are a family that lives by faith and joyfully gives account.

versiculo.text: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them?

cta.title: The digital field is ripe. Shall we <highlight>harvest together</highlight>?
